content:
Hi everyone,

Just one more week to go to DevDays Amsterdam! This year we have 7 student teams joining the Student Track :)

This will be the place to introduce yourself, get to know each other, start discussions, ask questions and so on. Please let me know if there's anything I can help you with.

See you next week in Amsterdam!

Lilian

Hi together
I and my teammade @Martin Birchmeier are looking forward to meet you all.
We are students from Switzerland and study medical informatics at the Bern University of applied science.
Safe travels to everyone. If past events are any indication, you're in for a great time.

Hi everyone.
I'm studying Data science at Miyagi University Japan and focusing on Health data interoperability. I'm so excited to join the unique opportunity to learn more about FHIR and the student track. See you and safe journey to everyone.
